description: Detects remote RPC calls to create or execute a scheduled task Author: Sagie Dulce, Dekel Paz. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Remote Schedule Task Lateral Movement via ITaskSchedulerService
query: (EventLog:"RPCFW" AND winlog.event_id:"3" AND InterfaceUuid:"86d35949\-83c9\-4044\-b424\-db363231fd0c" AND OpNum:("1" OR "3" OR "4" OR "10" OR "11" OR "12" OR "13" OR "14" OR "15"))
